text: ek-doosare se aage badho apane paalanahaar kee kshama tatha us svarg kee or, jisaka vistaar aakaash tatha dharatee ke vistaar ke[1] samaan hai. jo taiyaar kee gayee hai unake lie, jo eemaan laayen allaah aur usake rasoolon par. ye allaah ka anugrah hai, vah pradaan karata hai use, jise chaahata hai aur allaah bada udaar (dayaasheel) hai
